Nearly 40% of valid residence permits are issued to facilitate family reunification. Russia is home to large numbers of migran- ts, mainly from the Ukraine and Kazakhstan; the same two countries host a significant number of Russians (a total of 5.6 M). Most of the relatively small number of Russian refugees reside in the EU. (stock - country of origin) (stock valid residence permits - TCNs) RUSSIAN REFUGEES RUSSIAN MIGRANTS
